name: Ninja Car
description:
Well, you know, cars with ninja ropes.

Demo Game.

  • Press and hold anywhere on the screen to fire the ninja rope.
    • Drag down to move the cursor to the right of the car.
    • Drag up to move the cursor to the left.
  • Release to hook the ninja rope.
  • Double-tap the screen to cut the ninja ropes.
    • Use the ninja rope to spin your car around the hook.
  • Press the off-road-car-button to have a faster car on or off the dirt roads.
    • This button will also cut the ninja rope.
  • Press the street-car-button to have a faster car on the paved road.
  • The car will overheat and explode when it gets stuck.

Credits

Juri Knauth & Kevin Rampf
